channel.title: Bluetooth Transmitter on LC-Research
channel.description: Recent content in Bluetooth Transmitter on LC-Research

item.title: Connecting TWS Earbuds to Any TV or Projector
item.description: Is there anyway to watch movies on the big screen (TV or projector) without disturbing others? Can two people share wireless audio at the same time? What about TWS earbuds? Can we use them with our TVs?
